imdb.title: Ôran kôkô hosutobu
imdb.plot: A girl at a prestigious school befriends the members of a "host club".

episodes.title: Kyou kara kimi wa hosuto da
episodes.plot: Seeking quietude for study at an elite academy, honors student Haruhi Fujioka comes upon the school's Host Club - six elite boys who host parties for girl classmates - and becomes its newest and most reluctant member.

episodes.title: Kôkôsei host no oshigoto
episodes.plot: Kanako the chronic host-hopper (a girl who changes from host to host at regular intervals) gets the attention of Host Club, who decide to target her for happiness.

episodes.title: Shintai kensa ni go-youjin
episodes.plot: Tamaki, jealous that the twins get to spend far more time with Haruhi than he, wants her sex revealed, but that may occur on its own with school physicals coming.

episodes.title: Joshi manager shûrai
episodes.plot: A delusional girl obsessed with Sims (virtual people) believes Kyoya (who looks like one of them) is her fiancé and forces herself on Host Club as its new manager.

episodes.title: Futago kenka suru
episodes.plot: Haruhi's ability to tell one identical Hitachiin twin from the other sparks a furious fight between the twins.

episodes.title: Shôgakusei host wa yancha-kei
episodes.plot: A desperate 5th-grader comes to Host Club demanding to be taught how to be a ladies man but his negative reactions toward the hosts call into question his motives.

episodes.title: Janguru puuru SOS
episodes.plot: Enjoyment at a family-owned indoor tropical pool park turns into a Jurassic Park-like disaster for Host Club members due to discarded banana peels and live alligators from the tropical exhibit.

episodes.title: Taiyô to umi to host bu
episodes.plot: A day at the beach is a working holiday for the Host Club, but the boys also decide upon a game to see who among them can discover Haruhi's fear.

episodes.title: Roberia jogakuin no chôsen
episodes.plot: The Zuka Club, from a rival all-girls academy, challenges the Host Club for the fair hand of Haruhi, whom they feel has been woefully mistreated by the enforced subjugation of her superior gender.

episodes.title: Fujioka ke no nichijou
episodes.plot: The Host Club boys pay a surprise visit to Haruhi's home, curious as to how horrifyingly destitute her Commoner's Life can be.

episodes.title: Onii-chama wa ouji-sama
episodes.plot: The Host Club handles sibling issues between Ouran's Prince of Darkness and his light-loving little sister, Kirimi.

episodes.title: Honey senpai no amaku nai mikkakan
episodes.plot: Honey chafes at being deprived of sweets because of a tooth cavity, and Mori blames himself for not watching out for him more carefully.

episodes.title: Fushigi no kuni no haruhi
episodes.plot: Is Haruhi dreaming when she falls down a rabbit hole in Music Room #3 and meets Alice in Wonderland characters who, like characters in Oz to Dorothy, all look strikingly familiar?

episodes.title: Uwasa no host bu wo shuzai se yo
episodes.plot: While Host Club is a complete success, the Newspaper Club is not, but its president would like to change that with an exposé on the Host Club.

episodes.title: Karuizawa sawayaka batoru
episodes.plot: Haruhi takes a summer job at the bed and breakfast of her father's friend, which bends the host boys out of shape over being abandoned, so they follow.

episodes.title: Haruhi to hikaru no hatsu date dai sakusen
episodes.plot: Hikaru and Tamaki's insecurities show when Haruhi runs into a male friend from middle school days, but while Tamaki recovers, Hikaru does not, so Kaoru steps in for his twin's sake.

episodes.title: Kyoya no fuhoni na kyujitsu
episodes.plot: On the last day of summer vacation, Tamaki decides the elite members of Host Club should go on a field trip to observe commoners in their natural setting - a shopping mall.

episodes.title: Chika-kun no Honey datou sengen
episodes.plot: Honey's family relations are reviewed after younger brother Yasuchika drops by Ouran High School to give Honey a good thrashing.

episodes.title: Roberia jogakuin no gyakushû
episodes.plot: The Zuka Club girls from Lobelia Girls Academy get Haruhi to star in their annual theatrical production honoring President Benio's late mother, but it's really a plot for revenge.

episodes.title: Futago ga aketa tobira
episodes.plot: How the Hitachiin twins come to accept Tamaki's offer to join a new club he's forming.

episodes.title: Itsuka kabocha ni naru hi made
episodes.plot: Haruhi's class puts on a Halloween After Dark Test of Courage Tournament, where the Hitachiin twins take delight in tormenting their multi-phobic class rep/teammate.

episodes.title: Mori senpai ni deshi iri shigan
episodes.plot: The heir to a crime syndicate comes to Host Club to be Mori's apprentice, hoping for a share in his secret of having friends while owning a scary face.

episodes.title: Tamaki no mujikaku na yûutsu
episodes.plot: Having discovered Haruhi's gender secret, Kasanoda comes to Host Club to court her, unaware that his actions misidentify his sexuality.

episodes.title: Soshite kyôya wa deatta
episodes.plot: Told in flashback, Kyoya recalls for Haruhi how he and Tamaki - a very unlikely pair - got together to start up the Host Club.

episodes.title: Host bu kaisan sengen
episodes.plot: The Ouran High School Fair provides the catalyst for a pair of disapproving fathers to tip back into their sons' lives, with public humiliation for one and an arranged marriage for the other.

episodes.title: Kore ga oretachi no ouran sai
episodes.plot: With Lady Éclair keeping Tamaki incommunicado before whisking him off to France, remnants of the Host Club make an all-out effort to reach him.
